channel.title: Need help adding specs
channel.description: i have the spec bar but how do i add the specs

item.title: Need help adding specs
item.dc:creator: @clones clones
item.description:
@clones wrote:

dude i’ll redo the code for you you mist it out it’s

[code][public void DragonLongSpecial(){
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1305) {
if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 0)
if (spec >= 7) {
hitDiff = 24;
inCombat();
staticAnimation(248, absX, absY, 100);
setAnimation(1058);
actionTimer = 25;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
spec -= 7; // Specs - By Danie B
}
else {
sendMessage(“You need more special energy to do that.”); // Specs - By Danie B
}
} else {
sendMessage(“You Are Not Weilding A Dragon Long”);
}

}

public void WhipSpecial(){
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151) {
if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 0)
if (spec >= 7) {
hitDiff = 24;
inCombat();
staticAnimation(341, absX, absY-1, 100);
setAnimation(1658);
actionTimer = 25;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
spec -= 7; // Specs - By Danie B
}
else {
sendMessage(“You need more special energy to do that.”); // Specs - By Danie B
}
} else {
sendMessage(“You Are Not Weilding A Whip”);
}

}]

now look for

[code][yes emote]

and

[code][emote]

change em to

[code][case 168: // yes emote
sendQuest(“DLong”, 180);
DragonLongSpecial();
break;
case 169: // no emote
sendQuest(“Whip”, 181);
WhipSpecial();
break;
]

now look for

update();

under it add

[code][sendFrame126(“DLong”, 180);
sendFrame126(“Whip”, 181);
Posted at: September 17, 2006, 06:47:26 AM]

all creds to danieb the l33t
[/code][/code][/code][/code][/code]

Read full topic

item.description:
@D_A_N wrote:

no public void update() is wrong, search for :

setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerWeapon],1,playerWeapon);

and you should see the update() under there, add it under that.

item.title: Need help adding specs
item.dc:creator: @cowie cowie
item.description:
@cowie wrote:

declare these

Code:

public void DragonLongSpecial(){
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1305) {
if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 0)
if (spec >= 7) {
hitDiff = 24;
inCombat();
staticAnimation(248, absX, absY, 100);
setAnimation(1058);
actionTimer = 25;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
spec -= 7; // Specs - By Danie B
}
else {
sendMessage(“You need more special energy to do that.”); // Specs - By Danie B
}
} else {
sendMessage(“You Are Not Weilding A Dragon Long”);
}

}

public void WhipSpecial(){
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151) {
if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 0)
if (spec >= 7) {
hitDiff = 24;
inCombat();
staticAnimation(341, absX, absY-1, 100);
setAnimation(1658);
actionTimer = 25;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
spec -= 7; // Specs - By Danie B
}
else {
sendMessage(“You need more special energy to do that.”); // Specs - By Danie B
}
} else {
sendMessage(“You Are Not Weilding A Whip”);
}

}

now look for

Code:

yes emote

and

Code:

no emote

change em to

Code:

case 168: // yes emote
sendQuest(“DLong”, 180);
DragonLongSpecial();
break;
case 169: // no emote
sendQuest(“Whip”, 181);
WhipSpecial();
break;

now look for

Code:

update();

under it add

Code:

sendFrame126(“DLong”, 180);
sendFrame126(“Whip”, 181); [br][size=1]Posted at: September 17, 2006, 06:47:26 AM[/size][hr]all creds to danieb the l33t

item.title: Need help adding specs
item.dc:creator: @D_A_N D A N
item.description:
@D_A_N wrote:

search for update()

underneath add

sendFrame126("DLong", 180);

then search for public void and add this above :

public void DragonLongSpecial(){
	if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1305) {
	if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 0) 
	 if (spec >= 7) {							 
	hitDiff = 24;				
	inCombat();			
	staticAnimation(248, absX, absY, 100);	
	setAnimation(1058);			
	actionTimer = 25;		
	teleportToX = absX;			
	teleportToY = absY;			
	spec -= 7; // Specs - By Danie B
	}
else {
	sendMessage("You need more special energy to do that.");	 // Specs - By Danie B 	 
		} 	
	} else {
		sendMessage("You Are Not Weilding A Dragon Long"); 
		}

}

Then find

case 168: // yes emote

and replace all that with :

case 168: // yes emote
sendQuest("DLong", 180);
DragonLongSpecial();
break;

100% CREDIT TO DANIEB I TOOK FROM HIS TUT

Read full topic
